H0.text: Between 1959 and 1967 which city was the capital of Pakistan (Islamabad was being built). Karachi

H1.text: Between 1959 and 1967 which city was the capital of Pakistan (Islamabad was being built). Lahore

H2.text: Between 1959 and 1967 which city was the capital of Pakistan (Islamabad was being built). Quetta

H3.text: Between 1959 and 1967 which city was the capital of Pakistan (Islamabad was being built). 'Pindi

A4.text: Rawalpindi was the de‑facto federal capital of Pakistan, under Ayub Khan, from 1959 until Islamabad's establishment in 1967.

A5.text: Karachi had been selected as the first capital but Rawalpindi served as the de‑facto federal capital of Pakistan, under Ayub Khan, from 1959 until Islamabad's establishment in 1967.
